title: Letting Go
content:
The power of letting go and surrendering to fullness of our lives Dr. <!--more--> Judith Orloff is a board certified psychiatrist and an assistant clinical professor of psychiatry at the University of California at Los Angeles. An expert in energy medicine and helting and medical intuition, Dr Orloff has been researching and writing on the role of intuition for achieving emotional and physical wellness for the past 15 years.
 She is an advocate of health freedom and “a democracy of healing” wherein every aspect of the human being is acknowledged in the search for total health.
Dr Orloff sits on the board of Natural Health and Body and Soul magazines and is the author several best sellers, the most recent being “The Ecstasy of Surrender: Surprising Ways Letting Go Empower Your Life.
” Judith will be at the New York Open Center on 22 E.
30thStreet tomorrow, April 2 at 7 pm and again on April 6 at the Unity Church of NY on 70 W 36th Street
